page.title: 04HOUSING 3
page.content: All the council houses have flush windows instead of bow or bay.None of the council houses have a garage,although council garages are available to rent.Every house has a bath and running hot and cold water with central heating.Most of the houses have three bedrooms although the flats and bungalows have two.The houses and bungalows have small front and back gardens.The flats are soon to be demolished.Not a lot of change has taken place in this area. The privately owned houses and bungalows have bay windows.These were built in the{1930's}.They have medium sized front gardens and long back gardens and they all have central heating.
